name: Triple S - Simple Space Shooter
description:
A twin stick shooter that I created in approximately 2 weeks. I wanted to make something simple using the Kenney Game assets pack and also get some more experience using Unity.

The objective is simple, get as many points as possible. I hope you all enjoy it and any feedback is welcome.

Note: A controller is required to play this game. It has been tested using an XBox controller. Please check this link if you are using any other gamepad and experiencing problems: XBox 360 Controller Emulator
